name: Window of Memories
description:
In life, you won't survive by your own. You need to have someone, someone who we called 'Friend'. The friend, or should I said Old Friend, are the one we all have. Our journey starts and end with them. The struggle, the adventure, and the moment you all have together are the most precious gift and no one can have the same feeling except yourself. 

Window of Memories, is a full story-based 3DCG Visual Novel. It tells a story of friendship and redemption with its cinematic look and original soundtracks. Set in a fictional city 'Palm City' filled with drug problems and street living. You're playing as Akira xxx; a young optimist boy who surrounded by 6 childhood friends, and Yumiko xxx; a former Special Operative commander who surrounded by 4 old friends. You'll be meeting more people along the way.

DISCLAIMER: THE FOLLOWING STORY INCLUDE SENSITIVE THEME THAT PLAYER MAY FIND DISTURBANCE. VIEWER DISCRETION IS ADVISED.

Official Website: https://projecthunterz77.wixsite.com/window-of-memories
